original_title: Shah Rukh Khan injures nose while shooting in Los Angeles
original_body_lines: Superstar Shah Rukh Khan has undergone a minor surgery after he met with an accident in Los Angeles, US. The actor was in the US for a shoot where he ended up hurting his nose.

Shah Rukh, who is currently awaiting the release of his next Jawan, was shooting for a project when the incident occurred. According to a source quoted by the publication, Khan began bleeding after he hurt his nose and was immediately rushed to a hospital.

The doctors reportedly informed his team that there was nothing to worry and he was required to undergo a minor surgery to stop the bleeding. “Post the operation, SRK was spotted with a bandage on his nose and is now back in the country, recuperating at home,” the report further read.
Fans of the superstar took to Twitter and sent their good wishes to the actor for his speedy recovery. “Get Well Soon.

The superstar will be next seen in Jawan, also starring Vijay Sethupathi and Nayanthara. Helmed by Atlee, known for his blockbuster Tamil films, Jawan will mark Shah Rukh Khan’s second screen appearance this year after Pathaan.

Produced by Shah Rukh’s production company Red Chillies Entertainment, and Gauri Khan, Jawan will reportedly feature the actor in a double role and also feature guest appearances by Deepika Padukone and Sanjay Dutt. (Indian Express)
